original_text: Then Jesus told his disciples to come to him. ‘I feel sorry for this crowd,’ he said to them. ‘They have been here with me now for three days. They do not have any food. I do not want to send them away while they are hungry. They might fall down during their journey because they are weak.’
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들을 불러 이르시되 내가 무리를 불쌍히 여기노라 그들이 나와 함께 있은 지 이미 사흘이매 먹을 것이 없도다 길에서 기진할까 하여 굶겨 보내지 못하겠노라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus told his disciples to come to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 예수님은 제자들에게 자기에게 오라고 말씀하셨다.

sentences.original_text: 'They have been here with me now for three days.'
sentences.korean_translation: '그들이 지금까지 나와 함께 여기에 사흘 있었느니라.'

sentences.original_text: 'I do not want to send them away while they are hungry.'
sentences.korean_translation: '그들이 굶주릴 때 그들을 보내고 싶지 않으노라.'

sentences.original_text: 'They might fall down during their journey because they are weak.'
sentences.korean_translation: '그들이 약하므로 여행하는 동안 쓰러질 수 있으리라.'
